Documentation.content: Types for the Parallel Block Basic Linear Algebra Sub-programs support WARNING: attributes marked with WARNING can not be changed without making corresponding changes to the C++ attributes.

Definition.name: makeR8Set

Documentation.return: Dense matrix or sub-matrix (SET OF REAL8)

param.name: r
param.desc: The number of rows in the matrix or sub-matrix

param.name: s
param.desc: The number of columns in the matrix or sub-matrix

param.name: first_row
param.desc: The first row to include in the submatrix

param.name: first_col
param.desc: The first column to include in the submatrix

param.name: D
param.desc: The matrix to convert in Layout_Cell form

param.name: transpose
param.desc: Boolean to transpose the matrix during conversion (optional)

Documentation.content: Take a dataset of cells (or sub-matrix thereof) and pack into a dense matrix. in column major order [r1c1, r2c1, r3c1, ..., rNc1, r1c2, ..., rNcM]. First row and first column are one based.

Signature.sign: SET OF REAL8 makeR8Set(dimension_t r, dimension_t s, dimension_t first_row, dimension_t first_col, DATASET(Layout_Cell) D, BOOLEAN transpose=FALSE)
Signature.name: makeR8Set

Definition.Signature: SET OF REAL8 makeR8Set(dimension_t r, dimension_t s, dimension_t first_row, dimension_t first_col, DATASET(Layout_Cell) D, BOOLEAN transpose=FALSE)

Documentation.return: Dense matrix or sub-matrix (SET OF REAL8)

param.name: r
param.desc: The number of rows in the matrix or sub-matrix

param.name: s
param.desc: The number of columns in the matrix or sub-matrix

param.name: first_row
param.desc: The first row to include in the submatrix

param.name: first_col
param.desc: The first column to include in the submatrix

param.name: D
param.desc: The matrix to convert in Layout_Cell form

param.name: transpose
param.desc: Boolean to transpose the matrix during conversion (optional)

Documentation.content: Take a dataset of cells (or sub-matrix thereof) and pack into a dense matrix. in column major order [r1c1, r2c1, r3c1, ..., rNc1, r1c2, ..., rNcM]. First row and first column are one based.
